name: Battlefield Dance Gladiator
description:
This is the first game I have ever made. I made it almost two years ago for a class. In this game you play as someone inside of a game's file system. Music is : Brazil performed by Django Reinhardt. As always I got help with programing from @SuspiciousCloud. Other sounds I got from a sound library (I don't know who I stole them from).

Sadly I lost the unity files so I can't make an OSX or Linux version. If I find them I will upload them. Also there is no way to exit the game so you will have to alt tab and kill the application from your desktop.

Controls

WASD : Moving

Space : Jumping

Shift : Sprinting

[ You should keep the Shift key pressed the whole game... (I am sorry) ]
